LanguageData.Giantala.label: giantala
LanguageData.Giantala.description: A large ground sloth-like marsupial that lives in the undergrowth of the tropical forests. Its giant tail acts as an extra leg to help it stand upright.
LanguageData.Giantala.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.Giantala.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.Giantala.tools.head.label: head
